A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I probably will not continue to support this series if the quality and consistency do not improve. At least the prequels did not make me hate any existing characters from the series. Would have been better to leave Luke/Han/Leia out if they were going to ruin them. Hopefully Game of thrones (which up to this point has been great) won't have an ending that ruins the entire series longevity.
